item.title: Understanding Controller, Service, and Repository in Spring Boot
item.description: Java is truly an amazing programming language. And among its rich toolkit, Spring Boot definitely stands out as a powerful building block. With Spring Boot, we build fast, effective, and sustainable applications. In this article, weâ€™ll take a closer look at the core layers of Spring Boot: Controller, Service, and Repository annotations.
